title: Send Weekly Listing Performance Report
description: An agent needs to send a weekly performance update to a seller client.

tasks.description: Identify the listing and the seller client's contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the target listing and client.

tasks.description: Pull the listing's performance metrics for the past 7 days (online views, saves, showings scheduled).
Generate a standardized weekly report and email it to the seller.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates and sends the performance report.
